titles.title: To prohibit the designation of any agency, bureau, or other entity of the Department of Homeland Security as a separate agency or bureau for purposes of post employment restrictions in title 18, United States Code.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Crime, Terrorism, and Homeland Security.

bill.summary: 5/22/2007--Introduced. Prohibits the designation of any agency, bureau, or other entity of the Department of Homeland Security (DHS) as a separate agency or bureau for purposes of post employment restrictions on communications with DHS personnel.
